column5: "October 1, 2022 is now the deadline for Canadian night crawler suppliers to stop using black dirt and start using non-organic worm bedding instead." ok - who else HATES this black dirt? it gets everywhere and is a major pain. we ususally clean off the crawlers and put them into commercial newspaper based bedding. phish
Gonna have cleaner finger nails that's for sure,thanks phish for the info.
I'll gladly pay extra to go dirtless!!
I hate that dirt! I have to clean mine up and put them in newspaper bedding. This will save me time.

The dirt definitely sucks. I always re-package in paper bedding or I used to, until the Canadians banned importation of worms. THAT WERE ALREADY COMING TO THE STATES FROM CANADA. As a border agent once told me when inspecting my worms "EH, returning natives I see". Makes no sense, but whatever.....
